name: Beachcomber Hot Tub & Patio
tag_list: edmonton-hot-tubs, hot-tubs-edmonton, infrared-sauna-edmonton, patio-furniture-edmonton, barbecue-store-edmonton, edmonton-bar-stools
overview:
Beachcomber Hot Tubs & Patio is your premium store for hot tubs in Edmonton. We sell Edmonton infrared saunas, patio furniture, bar stools and we’re also a barbecue store! The development of every Beachcomber Hot Tub is based on our desire to focus on your health, happiness and well-being, and to create a more enjoyable, healthier environment for your home. The first Beachcomber Hot Tub was produced in 1978 by Founder Keith Scott, in the Canadian port city of Vancouver. Innovations then followed in rapid succession and the company steadily grew to become the largest hot tub manufacturer. Operations have now spread throughout North America and Europe. To learn more about Beachcomber please click read more within the categories that follow. Unique Beachcomber innovations Innovation, design and engineering are important to Beachcomber to create a hot tub that will compete on a world stage. We are always looking for ways to improve our hot tubs.

Classic comfort and performance with every Beachcomber sets us apart from the rest. A Beachcomber is energy efficient, durable and fully portable. Since 1978, our passion for innovation results in many unique Beachcomber features
